comments.body: Quote from: ThunderVM on February 21, 2023, 04:42:37 PMTOS:We do not allow the following activities on our servers:Mining cryptocurrency on vpsI'm a little bit surprised when reading this thread because you promote your service on the Bitcoin forum which is a cryptocurrency where mining is a natural activity users do.
